 ]

+]
+
 [[package]]
 name = "idna"
 version = "0.2.0"

@@ -7,7 +7,7 @@ publish = false
 
 [dependencies]
 pico-args = "0.3.0"
-flexi_logger = "0.14.0"
+log = "0.4"
 
 ra_syntax = { path = "../ra_syntax" }
 ra_ide = { path = "../ra_ide" }
@@ -19,3 +19,8 @@ ra_db = { path = "../ra_db" }
 path = "../ra_prof"
 # features = [ "cpu_profiler" ]
 # features = [ "jemalloc" ]
+
+[dependencies.env_logger]
+version = "0.7.1"
+default-features = false
+features = ["humantime"]
